title: Media Factory: Media Generation (Image, Video, Music, Narration)
intro: Your hero concept is only as convincing as the sensory experience around it. In this phase you'll manufacture a mini media kit—hero image, brand jingle, and narrated voice-over—that will power your explainer video, website, investor teaser, and social posts. By running the three generation tracks in parallel you can operate like an in-house creative agency, compressing days of design into minutes.
estimatedTime: 20 minutes (18 min online creation running in parallel, ~2 min coordination)

fields.label: Visual Style
fields.help: Choose the overall visual approach for your hero image
fields.tooltip: Defines the aesthetic direction for all visual assets. Photoreal works for tangible products, stylized illustration for tech/apps, minimalist for premium brands, and bold/dramatic for disruptive concepts.

fields.label: Perspective
fields.help: Choose the perspective for your hero image
fields.tooltip: Determines the focal emphasis of your hero image. Close-up highlights product details, interaction scene shows usage, lifestyle context demonstrates benefits, abstract/conceptual communicates brand values.

fields.label: Music Genre
fields.placeholder: e.g., Upbeat electronic, Warm acoustic, Corporate cinematic
fields.help: Describe the musical style that matches your brand
fields.tooltip: Sets the emotional tone for your brand jingle and background music. Upbeat electronic suits tech products, warm acoustic works for family brands, corporate cinematic fits B2B services.

fields.label: Voice Persona
fields.help: Choose the voice character for your narration
fields.tooltip: Defines the personality and tone for all spoken content including explainer videos, ads, and voice agents. Should align with your target audience's preferences and brand personality.

fields.label: Featured Statistic
fields.placeholder: Select one jaw-dropping statistic from Section B of Science_Evidence.pdf
fields.help: Choose the most compelling statistic to feature in your narration
fields.tooltip: The most credible, impressive data point from your Phase 3 research that will grab attention and validate your solution. This becomes the hook that opens your narrated content and marketing materials.

promptTemplate:
**PURPOSE**: Create an engaging 60-second voiceover script that introduces our company's solution in a way that builds trust, demonstrates value, and motivates action. This script should work as background narration on our website, over promotional videos, or as standalone audio content.

**SCRIPT REQUIREMENTS:**

Write a 60-second narration introducing **{{phase5.chosen_concept_code_name}}**, our new {{phase1.sector}} solution.

• Hook potential customers in the first line using this statistic: "{{selected_statistic}}".
• Weave in this expert pull-quote for credibility: "[Pull-quote from Science_Evidence.pdf]".
• Describe one key interactive feature and expected benefit in ≤ 25 words.
• End with a rousing call to action (<15 words).

Tone: {{voice_persona}} (warm, encouraging, trustworthy).

Output plain text only.

items.label: Resource Requirements
items.content:
**Tools Needed:**
• **Track 6A** (Hero Image): Sora
• **Track 6B** (Music): Suno.ai
• **Track 6C** (Narration): ChatGPT + ElevenLabs
• **Track 6D** (Website Copy): Claude
• **Track 6E** (Podcast): NotebookLM

**Team Assignment:** Multiple team laptops should be logged into the respective services; different groups of teammates can "own" each track.

items.label: Parallel Execution Strategy
items.content: **Tip:** Assign one teammate to each track (A, B, C, D, E) so the outputs finish roughly together. Total time: ≈ 20 minutes (18 min online creation running in parallel, ~2 min coordination)

action.title: Make Creative Decisions
items: Visual style (e.g., Photoreal vs. stylized illustration)
Perspective (e.g., Close-up product glamour shot vs. interaction scene)
Voice persona (e.g., Friendly parent, energetic coach, or trusted expert)
Featured statistic (select one jaw-dropping stat from Science_Evidence.pdf)

steps.action: Open Sora, select image → prompt (select aspect ratio and do 4v for 4 versions at once)
Prompt for a hero image of your top product or service. Send it a few times for lots of options, change and refine your prompt until you get what you want
Generate many variations → pick best, download
Rename to **hero.png** and save to project folder
**Bonus:** Switch to video and prompt videos you might want to use somewhere in your website. Sora's videos are better right now for conceptual video and less for pure realism

Open Suno → "Create" in the sidebar. If you click "Simple" you can just describe the style you want and what you want it to be about. Experiment a bit (you don't have unlimited tries for free). Try for 10 different prompts. You can also click "custom" and have it make a song to your own lyrics
Make a Music Prompt that matches your company's brand adjectives and chosen genre
Choose best version → download and rename as **jingle.mp3**
Open ChatGPT. Use the script prompt template (available in Prompt Preview below) with your selected statistic and pull-quote. Copy output text
ElevenLabs → "Go to App" (top right) → "Instant Speech" → Select your voice persona. Explore the voice library, then paste script. Generate Speech → download and rename to **voiceover.mp3**

**Team Discussion:** Briefly discuss your main goals for the website copy. Think about: Who is your precise target audience? What's the #1 thing they should learn or feel? What action do you want them to take?

Write a detailed prompt for Claude. Instruct it to:
• Act as an expert copywriter specializing in your company's sector
• Use uploaded documents as sole source of truth: **Hero_Concept_Detailed_Brief.docx** and **Science_Evidence.pdf**
• Generate specific labeled copy elements: "Main Headline," "Engaging Sub-headline," "Introductory Body Copy," "3-5 Benefit-Oriented Bullet Points," and "Persuasive Call to Action"
• Match your brand's tone using your three brand adjectives
Open Claude → Upload **Hero_Concept_Detailed_Brief.docx** AND **Science_Evidence.pdf** → Paste your prompt → Generate → Save as **copy.txt**
**Setup Notebook:** Open notebooklm.google.com → Click + New Notebook. Rename it

**Add Key Sources:** Click + Sources → Upload your **Science_Evidence.pdf** file. If you have other relevant text documents (like an explainer video script), upload those too. Let NotebookLM process them
**Generate Podcast:** Click "Audio Overview." This will take a couple of minutes to complete and be available
**Download Audio:** When complete, find the Download option → Download → Rename to **podcast.mp3** and save to project folder

expectedOutput.whyItMatters: hero.png powers your website hero section & video first frame. voiceover.mp3 provides narration track for videos. jingle.mp3 serves as background layer in video, plus 'Play Jingle' button on site. copy.txt becomes the main source for website copy when building the website.
expectedOutput.nextSteps: Success criteria: each file exists, matches brand adjectives & colors. You now have a complete media kit ready for Phase 7's website and video creation.
